assert.h

00001 // we'll allow this file to be included multiple times
00002 // since assert() might be re-defined in many places
00003 #include <lang/internalError.h>
00004 
00005 // by default, we'll be using CRT assert
00006 #include <assert.h>
00007 
00008 // check if non-debug assert is requested
00009 #ifdef NDEBUG_ASSERT
00010 #ifndef _DEBUG
00011 #undef assert
00012 #define assert(E) if (E) {} else {lang::internalError(__FILE__,__LINE__,#E);}
00013 #endif // !_DEBUG
00014 #endif // NDEBUG_ASSERT
